notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: Prof Striano conceptualized, coordinated, supervised data collection and critically reviewed the manuscript for important intellectual content.
Dr. Orsini, Dr. Foiadelli and Drs Corsi designed the study, collected data and drafted, reviewed and revised the manuscript.
Drs Antonella Riva and Dr. Santangelo collected data and drafted, reviewed and revised the manuscript.
Prof Peroni and Prof Savasta critically reviewed the manuscript for important intellectual content.
All authors approved the final manuscript as submitted and agree to be accountable for all aspects of the work .
